s.text: The second, used here, denotes the methionine as amino acid +1.
Collectively, our results suggest that the T790M mutation is associated with lesions that progress while on gefitinib or erlotinib.
Sequencing chromatograms of DNA from four of four clones showed both the 2369 C?T and 2573 T?G mutations, confirming that both mutations were in the same allele (data not shown).
Amounts of total EGFR (t-EGFR) were determined using an anti-EGFR monoclonal antibody, and actin served as an indicator of relative levels of protein per sample.

The LocusLink (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/LocusLink/) accession number for the KRAS2 sequence discussed in this paper is 3845; the GenBank (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Genbank/) accession number for the KRAS2 sequence discussed in this paper is NT_009714.
A baseline CT scan of the chest demonstrated innumerable bilateral nodules (Figure S1B, left panel), which were markedly reduced in number and size 4 mo after treatment (Figure S1B, middle panel).
Reference EGFR sequence was obtained from LocusLink accession number 1956 and GenBank accession number NT_033968.
